Please select a PR template from `.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE/`:

- [feature.md](?template=feature.md) - For new features
- [bugfix.md](?template=bugfix.md) - For bug fixes
- [release.md](?template=release.md) - For version releases

To use a template, add `?template=<filename>` to the PR URL or select from the template dropdown.
